page.title: 01Petworth: headlines
page.content: Petworth: Headline Information (page titles highlighted) Petworth in West Sussex has a population of 2920 and dominates this rural area. Chichester SW 14 miles; Guildford N 20; London NE 48; Arundel S 11. Petworth contains the{House}open to the public and the deer{Park. The {Medical Centre, Cottage Hospital}and {Old People's Homes, Churches, The {Library}and{The Police}(own sub-division) serve the needs of the town.{Farming}is a major occupation. 1985 was marked by several special events -{The Visit by the Scottish {Canadians}(3 pages),{The Petworth {Ethiopia Appeal}(2 pages), and the{ {Festival}.{Local News, Interesting {People and Playground Games}all attempt to describe the town as seen by the school-children who made this.
